Text: Segmentation identifierTeb Elizabeth Nancy Mary and Jim would like to discuss with you the segmentation identifier Tennessee says that they do not use this for identifying a segmented release from a releasing shipper And I believe that the GISB defintion defines it as something else Well bring the definition with us

FW Revised Prices and Imbalances worksheetTeb and Debbie Attached is a revised version of the spreadsheet that I sent to Shelley Jim Original Message From Studebaker James Sent Thursday October AM To Corman Shelley Coon Galen Nacey Sheila Cc Holmes Bradley Subject Revised Prices and Imbalances worksheet Importance High Shelley Sheila and Galen Attached is the spreadsheet with the revised imbalance quantities in it I will send you all the individual monthly imbalance calculations soon this morning Jim

DVC spreadsheetAttached is the spreadsheet for which I reformatted the print parameters so that all information prints I have not yet added the POI numbers or Division numbers yet but will do so soon Thx Jim

RE FPU NEW SMYRNA DELIVERY POINT QUESTION Cc PGS in the past and in the present has all divisions I am not sure what the tariff means by plant either I do not know if any of PGS current divisions has plants in them or not In reading the messages below Teb is correct in that Chris can trade any real imbalances between any of his firm or DPOA contracts However if both firm contracts are on one DPOA then any market area delivery imbalances created on either of his firm contracts will be summarized together on the one DPOA contract and become a single market area delivery imbalance available for trade with any other entity with an offsetting market area delivery imbalance Also cash out will be calculated using the summarized DPOA market area delivery imbalance quantity net of any offsetting trades I do not see that Chris will have two balancing entities to deal with if both firm agreements are tied to one DPOA contract as Nancy has stated below Jim Original Message From King Jr Frazier Sent Monday January PM To Bastida Nancy Lokey Teb Long John Cramer James Nacey Sheila Cc Dietz Rick Smith Buzz Studebaker James Subject RE FPU NEW SMYRNA DELIVERY POINT QUESTION The new point would have to qualify as a division under Section af which it does not appear to do or a plant Not sure we have a definition for plant Will have to look at original filing to see what was meant by plants Jim how have we treated plants in the past Did Peoples have divisions or plants Original Message From Bastida Nancy Sent Monday January PM To King Jr Frazier Lokey Teb Long John Cramer James Nacey Sheila Cc Dietz Rick Smith Buzz Studebaker James Subject RE FPU NEW SMYRNA DELIVERY POINT QUESTION The way the dpoa is set up now is the way it would be reflected if the two contracts were combined However if the contracts are combined does that mean that we would make the point a division If so the problem is solved otherwise were back to the same issue nb Original Message From King Jr Frazier Sent Monday January PM To Lokey Teb Long John Cramer James Nacey Sheila Cc Dietz Rick Bastida Nancy Smith Buzz Studebaker James Subject RE FPU NEW SMYRNA DELIVERY POINT QUESTION I agree with Teb The bookout is GTC Section A Not sure what you mean by Balancing Entities The same DPOA covers both contracts But there are two contracts And the two contracts are accounted for separately Each contract must be balanced Whether covered by one DPOA or two DPOAs Is that what you mean Since FPU holds two FTS contracts according to Nancy we could probably combine them if FPU wants top do that Jim says that we did that for Peoples We would have to check and see if there was any reason not to combine If they were combined then there would be balancing under one contract Original Message From Lokey Teb Sent Monday January AM To Long John Cramer James Nacey Sheila King Jr Frazier Cc Dietz Rick Bastida Nancy Smith Buzz Subject RE FPU NEW SMYRNA DELIVERY POINT QUESTION He can net imbalances together by booking out the imbalance of one entity with the imbalance of the other entity In other words do a bookout with himself This can be done without adding the single point as a division to an existing divisional contract Original Message From Long John Sent Monday January AM To Cramer James Nacey Sheila Lokey Teb King Jr Frazier Cc Dietz Rick Bastida Nancy Smith Buzz Subject FPU NEW SMYRNA DELIVERY POINT QUESTION Importance High I spoke with Chris Snyder this morning and his request is to add New Smyrna as a th Division to his existing Divisions in order to have one Balancing Entity vs Two Balancing Entities so he can net imbalances together He is not looking for section rights and he knows the New Smyrna lateral is constrained and he can not move any additional volumes there Chris right now will have to deal with Two Balancing Entities and this is what he is trying to avoid He will do what ever it takes on his end that we requirerequest Please take another look with the one reason Balancing in mind Give me your feedback Thanks John

FW Paper SituationFYI from the toaster abductors Original Message From Buehler Craig Sent Wednesday January AM To Green Alma Subject RE Paper Situation We have your toaster Youll get it back when our demands are met Leave boxes of x paper no damn hole punch paper either under the TV on the west end of the th floor and youll be toasting away within a few hours This isnt from Craig weve hacked into his email Enron Peoples Liberation Front EPLF Original Message From Green Alma Getting paper for the floor is out of my hands I have had three calls this morning plus a note left on my desk to order paper Donna Scott is working with the mail room Our toaster that Rick Dietz bought when we moved down here is missing this AM Has been reported to Facilities who will report to Security If anyone knows anything would you please let me know Tnx Alma G

RE Index PostingYes looks good to me too Original Message From Nacey Sheila Sent Friday January PM To Cady Rachel Lokey Teb Coon Galen Studebaker James Subject RE Index Posting Same here Great presentation Original Message From Cady Rachel Sent Friday January PM To Lokey Teb Coon Galen Nacey Sheila Studebaker James Subject RE Index Posting I agree Great job Original Message From Lokey Teb Sent Friday January PM To Coon Galen Cady Rachel Nacey Sheila Studebaker James Subject RE Index Posting Looks great to me Original Message From Coon Galen Sent Friday January PM To Cady Rachel Nacey Sheila Studebaker James Cc Lokey Teb Subject Index Posting Attached is a form that might work let me know what changes are needed Galen File IndexNewdoc

RE Web Site Posting for New Cash Out Pricing ProvisionsLooks good to me too I agree with Rachel that we should post in the critical notices and in the balancing documents section Original Message From Cady Rachel Sent Friday January PM To Lokey Teb Corman Shelley Dietz Rick Coon Galen Boatman Jack Nacey Sheila Studebaker James Kilmer III Robert Subject RE Web Site Posting for New Cash Out Pricing Provisions Looks good to me I think we should post it in the critical notices andor balancing documents section Original Message From Paschal Zelda On Behalf Of Lokey Teb Sent Friday January PM To Corman Shelley Dietz Rick Coon Galen Boatman Jack Cady Rachel Nacey Sheila Studebaker James Kilmer III Robert Subject Web Site Posting for New Cash Out Pricing Provisions Please review attachment for web posting Will posting be critical or noncritical File Cash Out Web Site Noticedoc

RE Updated CAS overview with RamonaDue to Ramona being out Friday I would like to keep this CAS overview scheduled for today Thursday afternoon from to pm Ramona will be available for only a short time today Perry if you dont mind for today could you show Jerry Skertich and I a CAS overview from your viewpoint Darrell perhaps Jerry and I can get with you either tomorrow or sometime next week to get your viewpoint Please let me know if everyone is okay with meeting today for about an hour I will see if I can get room for this afternoon Thx Jim Original Message From Schoolcraft Darrell Sent Thursday January AM To Frazier Perry Studebaker James Betancourt Ramona Skertich Gerald Subject RE Updated CAS overview with Ramona I can make that ds Original Message From Frazier Perry Sent Wednesday January AM To Studebaker James Betancourt Ramona Skertich Gerald Cc Schoolcraft Darrell Subject RE Updated CAS overview with Ramona Sure I can make the Friday time frame Original Message From Studebaker James Sent Wednesday January AM To Betancourt Ramona Skertich Gerald Frazier Perry Cc Schoolcraft Darrell Subject FW Updated CAS overview with Ramona Ramona Jerry and Perry Darrell will be out Thursday afternoon Are you all available Friday afternoon at the same hours to pm Thx Jim Original Appointment From Schoolcraft Darrell Sent Wednesday January AM To Studebaker James Subject Tentative Updated CAS overview with Ramona When Thursday January PM PM GMT Central Time US Canada Where TBA I will be out Thursday afternoon How about Friday sometime ds

FW Updated CAS overview with Ramona Cc Ramona Jerry and Perry Darrell will be out Thursday afternoon Are you all available Friday afternoon at the same hours to pm Thx Jim Original Appointment From Schoolcraft Darrell Sent Wednesday January AM To Studebaker James Subject Tentative Updated CAS overview with Ramona When Thursday January PM PM GMT Central Time US Canada Where TBA I will be out Thursday afternoon How about Friday sometime ds

Canceled CAS overview with Ramona continuedWhen Wednesday January AM AM GMT Central Time US Canada Where TBA Perry and Darrell Would you be able to attend a CAS overview with us tomorrow am Ramona is giving us the rundown on CAS how it works etc and she would like for either or both of you to help tell us about CAS Thx Jim

RE Web Site Posting for New Cash Out Pricing ProvisionsLooks good to me too I agree with Rachel that we should post in the critical notices and in the balancing documents section Original Message From Cady Rachel Sent Friday January PM To Lokey Teb Corman Shelley Dietz Rick Coon Galen Boatman Jack Nacey Sheila Studebaker James Kilmer III Robert Subject RE Web Site Posting for New Cash Out Pricing Provisions Looks good to me I think we should post it in the critical notices andor balancing documents section Original Message From Paschal Zelda On Behalf Of Lokey Teb Sent Friday January PM To Corman Shelley Dietz Rick Coon Galen Boatman Jack Cady Rachel Nacey Sheila Studebaker James Kilmer III Robert Subject Web Site Posting for New Cash Out Pricing Provisions Please review attachment for web posting Will posting be critical or noncritical File Cash Out Web Site Noticedoc

RE CashOut AnalysisGalen I think you can get the break out of receipt supply area imbalances vs market area imbalance from the monthly excel spreadsheets in the common directory pFGTUSERSFGTMktg under Lindley the place you directed me to earlier today I took the spreadsheet for July and sorted it by imbalance type ie Market Area No Notice Receipt Point etc for my reconciliation I think this will get you the numbers Shelley is looking for the market area imbalances positive and negative Jim Original Message From Corman Shelley Sent Tuesday October PM To Coon Galen Studebaker James Subject CashOut Analysis GalenJim Thanks for the info I have been building spreadsheet cases all day FYI majorityminority isnt driven by the number of shippers its driven by the volume I made the appropriate changes on Galens spreadsheet A couple of further things that I need I need to reconcile the net volume on Galens sheet by month with the net cash out volumes on Jims sheet There are huge differences Can these really all be receipt imbalances Galen for the months Aug Jul can you break out receipt imbalances from market imbalances We are only planning to put the majorityminority pricing on the market area imbalances Let me know if you guys want to sit down and talk through this I need to get Teb my final analysis by the end of the week

RE CashOut AnalysisShelley I have been looking throught Galens numbers for July and I have found four cash out payments with quantities totaling mmbtus These were payments to Dynegy and Texaco Natural Gas I am running the invoice log to see if it will tell me what kind of payments these were I suspect these are for ParkNRide and maybe OBA cash outs in the supply area Shown below and also attached is a spreadsheet to reconcile the July numbers Galen I think we will need for you to go back through the numbers you provided for each month and exclude any quantities that have to do with PNR and with supply area OBA cash inout payments I will still need to reconcile the original market area imbalance numbers that I provided earlier with any PPAs and other adjustments that are included in the Balance Before Bookout imbalance quantities for each month My original list of market area imbalance quantities did not include any PPAs Thx Jim July Imbalance Quantities vs Cash InOut Summary Quantities Dkts Net DPOA imbalance for July this is the number I originally provided PPAs included in the Balance Before Bookout stmts for July mostly measurement adjmts Net Subtotal Market Area Delivery Imbalances for July including PPAs from BBB stmts Net Subtotal No Notice Imbalance for July from BBB stmts Net Subtotal Receipt Imbalances Supply Area for July from BBB stmts Net Subtotal Western Div Delivery Imbalances for July from BBB stmts Net Total Actual July net imbalance for all imbalance types Possible PNR and OBA cash out quantities for July pmts to Dynegy and Texaco Net of above two quantities Net from Galens Cash InOut summary for July Unreconciled difference I have not been able to figure out this difference Original Message From Corman Shelley Sent Tuesday October PM To Coon Galen Studebaker James Subject CashOut Analysis GalenJim Thanks for the info I have been building spreadsheet cases all day FYI majorityminority isnt driven by the number of shippers its driven by the volume I made the appropriate changes on Galens spreadsheet A couple of further things that I need I need to reconcile the net volume on Galens sheet by month with the net cash out volumes on Jims sheet There are huge differences Can these really all be receipt imbalances Galen for the months Aug Jul can you break out receipt imbalances from market imbalances We are only planning to put the majorityminority pricing on the market area imbalances Let me know if you guys want to sit down and talk through this I need to get Teb my final analysis by the end of the week

Prices and Imbalance Qties Table Aug through July Cc Shelley Attached are the prices and the net monthly imbalance quantities for the period August though July I also included the prices for August and September since they were available Please let us know if you need any more information Jim

Monthly Cash Out ReconciliationsShelley By tomorrow morning I am pretty sure I can have the period Aug through Jul Cash InOut reconciled roughly with the PNR and the large PPAs accounted for for each month Attached is what I have summarized so far Please go to the last worksheet tab called SummaryCashInOutStats I have also finished summarizing within each month the total Cash Out qty and the total Cash In qty and priced each at the appropriate cash inout price Since the imbalance quantities are broken out the actual cash settlement per customer will vary some from actual as the cash inout mechanism nets the quantities by customer first before applying a cash inout rate to that customer Thx Jim
